DOC.brief_summary: Warm water base cycling exercise training would favorable cold water base cycling exercise training land base cycling exercise vascular function type 2 diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Effect Warm Cold Water Exercise Training Vascular Function Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion include type 2 diabetes ( defined American Diabetes Association ) , baseline glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) value 79 % , previous exercise training past 6 month . All participant free diabetic nephropathy , diabetic retinopathy , severe diabetic neurophathy , severe cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease . Participants exclude drop complete less 80 % training schedule .
